## Bio

I'm an economist at Mexico's Social Security Institute ([IMSS](https://datos.imss.gob.mx/)).

I'm interested in labor economics, development, data science and public policy.

I'm currently studying a MS in Applied Economics at [ITAM](itam.mx).

Check out my [CV](cv.qmd) and a [selection of my work](research.qmd).

## R packages

I'm also an R enthusiast, so much so that I've developed a package:

[`tidyenigh`](https://www.estebandegetau.com/tidyenigh/) Ships analysis-ready data from the Encuesta Nacional de Ingresos y Gastos de los Hogares ([ENIGH](https://www.inegi.org.mx/programas/enigh/nc/2022/))
